title: Young women of Japan
creator_credit: Iwanami Productions and Japan. Ministry of Foreign Affairs
brief_description: Illustrates the role of women in Japan’s development in manpower, technical skill and creative talent, by showing examples of young women working in air transport, clothing, graphic design, farming, broadcasting and manufacturing.
